head.title: Напиши нам
head.keywords: BibleTime, Contact, Contact us, help, support

section.title: How to contact us
section.para: Если у вас появились вопросы, идеи для новых функций или просто замечания, пожалуйста, выберите правельный адрес для вашей корреспонденции на этой странице.

formalpara.para: If you find bugs in BibleTime use this link to report it so it can be fixed in later versions.
If you have problems with BibleTime use this link to get support how to solve them.
If you have an idea how to improve BibleTime please use this link to tell about it!
If you have problem with the webpages or if you have some ideas how to improve them please write it down using the link!
